translated: Elder’s Birth Stories🔽The Chapter about the Giver of Tuvara
The Elder Kuṭidhūpaka’s Birth Story🔽“I was a keeper of huts
and from time to time I burnt incense,
and I was pleased with my own hands.
I do not know of a bad destination,
this is the fruit of offering incense.
I have done what the Awakened One said.”🔽Thus the Elder Kuṭidhūpaka recited these verses.

original: Itthaṁ sudaṁ āyasmā kuṭidhūpako thero imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.🔽Kuṭidhūpakattherassāpadānaṁ pañcamaṁ.
analyzed: ittham sudam āyasmā kuṭidhūpakaḥ theraḥ imāḥ gāthāyaḥ abhāsittha ati 🔽kuṭidhūpaka therassa apadānam pañcama
translated: The Elder Kuṭidhūpaka’s Birth Story, the fifth.
